TopicTitle: Got my hopes up for an early release of .23

Articles.Content: I was scrolling through Steams store page when I came across KSP and written in the corner was just updated. So I quickly launched my game to see, but nope no .23. Steam must be jumping the gun or something.
Could have saved yourself the hassle and just read the forums, the date has been up for almost a week now.
The Steam version has been updated a few times as far as the Launcher goes. Otherwise, version 0.23 has not been released yet. Closing this to avoid confusion to others.
